title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Healthcare Transformed: Reimagining the Future with Generative AI (AIM241)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 医疗保健转型：用生成式AI重新构想未来 (AIM241)
abstract: Join a panel discussion hosted by PwC, featuring four Chief Information Officers from leading healthcare systems, as they explore the future of healthcare in a financially strained and rapidly evolving landscape. Discover how organizations are leveraging generative AI and secure, cloud-native platforms to boost productivity, reduce operational costs, and empower their clinical, operational, and research teams. Learn how to scale AI responsibly across complex enterprises, transform care delivery, and drive innovation with measurable outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 参加由普华永道主办的小组讨论，四位来自领先医疗保健系统的首席信息官将探讨在财务紧张和快速发展环境中医疗保健的未来。了解各组织如何利用生成式人工智能和安全的云原生平台来提高生产力、降低运营成本，并为其临床、运营和研究团队赋能。学习如何在复杂企业中负责任地扩展人工智能、转变护理服务模式，并通过可衡量的成果推动创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

presenter.name: Andy Crowder
presenter.title: SVP, Chief Digital and AI Officer

presenter.name: Geoffry Hook
presenter.title: Chief Information Officer - Part of Northwell Health

presenter.name: Rajesh Nair
presenter.title: CIO
presenter.company: WellSense Health Plan - Part of BMC

presenter.name: Michael Reagin
presenter.title: Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer
